DPU_DopplerProcHWA_StaticConfig_t Struct Reference
dopplerProc DPU External Data Structures

Doppler DPU static configuration parameters. More...

#include <dpu/dopplerproc/dopplerprochwa.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t numTxAntennas
 Number of transmit antennas.
 
uint8_t numRxAntennas
 Number of receive antennas.
 
uint8_t numVirtualAntennas
 Number of virtual antennas.
 
uint16_t numRangeBins
 Number of range bins.
 
uint16_t numDopplerChirps
 Number of Doppler chirps.
 
uint16_t numDopplerBins
 Number of Doppler bins.
 
uint8_t log2NumDopplerBins
 Log2 of number of Doppler bins.
 

Detailed Description

Doppler DPU static configuration parameters.

The structure is used to hold the static configuration parameters for the Doppler DPU. The following conditions must be satisfied:

   numTxAntennas * numRxAntennas * numDopplerChirps * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) <= 16 KB (one HWA memory bank)
   numTxAntennas * numRxAntennas * numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t) <= 16 KB (one HWA memory bank)
